name: TumbleTown: Worker's Rush
description:
:: Intro ::

This is our game for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Since the theme is "Roll of the Dice", we choose to make a Resource Management game where all resources are Dices!

Place Workers, upgrade structures and prepare the village for the winter in TumbleTown: Worker's Rush.

Music credits for Patrick de Arteaga.

Arts under CC0.

:: Commands::

Everything can be made with the mouse interactions.

Use Arrow Keys and/or WASD to navigate the map as well.

:: Guide ::

Objective

The Winter is coming.

You have 15 Weeks to use your management skills to Store 9 resources of each in Storages, trains 2 Soldiers, 2 Collectors and 1 Builder.

General Instructions

The Week has 4 Steps.

Click on "Go!" to advance through Steps of the Week.

Step 1 - Workers

Place workers on Generators, Buildings Under Construction or Training Grounds.
Click on the Worker and then on the Card you need them to be.
Click again to remove a Worker to the Rest Area.
In this step, all workers must be placed (not resting).

Step 2 - Resources

Every Worker on a Generator will receive a Dice from the resouce.
Place dices by clicking on them and then on:
- Storage
- Workers at Under Construction Buildings and/or Training Grounds.
You can click on a Placed Dice to trash it. Any dice not places will be discarted after this Step.

Phase 3 - Construction

On this Step, all Under Construction Building with the necessary resources will be Built, and all Workers training with the necessary food on them will be upgraded.
Click on "Go!" to move to the next Step.

Phase 4 - New Construction

The Main Hall will (that card that you never used before in the center) will generate a new Card:

- If its a Generator, place it on the left side of the map.
- If its an Under Construction Building, place it above or below the Main Hall.
- If you don't want that card, just click "Go!" and it will be discarted.
